name: Derelict - Tech Demo
description:
Derelict is a escape demo built to show case my C++ capabilities as well as my level design and engine experience with the Unreal 4 engine. 

Objective:

Place crates on the green highlighted roped areas to open the doors and escape the Derelict ship.

Controls:

  • WASD: Move
  • Hold Space: Jump
  • Hold Left Mouse Btn: Grab Crates (When close)

This is apart of a course I am currently taking on Udemy -  https://www.udemy.com/course/unrealcourse/

You can find a blog I made detailing my journey through this Section - Building Escape: https://community.gamedev.tv/t/building-escape-game/149207/9

All visuals came from the UE4 marketplace.

  • Polar Sci-Fi Facility
  • Landscape Backgrounds
